Interface KalmanFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StateEstimationFilter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractKalmanFilter, StupidKalmanFilter

    public interface KalmanFilter
extends StateEstimationFilter
    Kalman Filter interface.

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        void predict(float[] u)
        Kalman Filter prediction (of the next state).
        Parameters:
        u - : Control vector. This indicates the magnitude of any control system's or user's control on the situation.

      • update

        void update(float[] z)
        Kalman Filter update.
        Parameters:
        z - : Measurement vector. This contains the real-world measurement we received in this time step.

      • getStateVector

        float[] getStateVector()
        Returns:
        Current state vector.

      • getCovarianceMatrix

        float[][] getCovarianceMatrix()
        Returns:
        Current covariance matrix.
